string-array.name: A2
string-array.item: Two (2) gallons of milk (reduced fat, low fat, fat free, or sweet acidophilus)
One (1) dozen large white grade A eggs
Two (2) 11.5–12 oz containers of frozen juice or two (2) 46–48 oz containers of juice
Sixteen (16) oz dried beans/peas or Four (4) cans 15oz-16oz canned beans
One (1) 16–18 oz jar peanut butter
16 oz Whole Wheat Bread/Whole Grain Product

string-array.name: A
string-array.item: Two (2) gallons of milk (reduced fat, low fat, fat free, or sweet acidophilus)
Choose 3(any combination) of: 14–16 oz tofu, quart buttermilk, 12 oz can evaporated milk or choose one (1) 9.6 oz container nonfat dry milk
Sixteen(16)oz store brand cheese (8 or 16 oz pkg)
One (1) 11.5–12 oz container of frozen juice or 46–48 oz container of juice
Thirty-six (36) oz of cereal (buy 11 oz or larger)
